document_data.name: Black Horse
document_data.mainbody: The '''Black Horse''' was an inn/[[tavern]] located in [[Archenbridge]] during late 14{{Th}} century [[DR]]. It was mostly frequented by adventurers and travelers looking to save some money on more modest accommodations.
document_data.Prices: A room at the Black Horse cost 8 [[sp]] a night. The tavern offered [[Archenwood stout]], a locally brewed lager, for 5 [[cp]] a draft.
